name: Rictavio
skills: Arcana +9, Insight +7, Medicine +7, Perception +7, Religion +6, Sleight of Hand +4

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment.
descriptions: In addition to his sword cane, Rictavio wears a hat of disguise and a ring of mind shielding, and he carries a spell scroll of raise dead.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Rictavio is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Rictavio has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): augury, lesser restoration, protection from poison
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): augury, lesser restoration, protection from poison

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): magic circle, remove curse, speak with dead
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): magic circle, remove curse, speak with dead

descriptions.raw: * 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement

descriptions.raw: * 5th level (1 slot): dispel evil and good
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 5th level (1 slot): dispel evil and good

special_abilities.name: Undead Slayer.
descriptions: When Rictavio hits an undead with a weapon attack, the undead takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage of the weapon's type.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Rictavio makes two attacks with his sword cane.

actions.name: Sword Cane.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage (wooden cane) or piercing damage (silvered sword).
